# init

**Instance Method**

Handles the basic initialization of the dispatch source.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init();
```

## Return Value

`true` if initialization was successful, or `false` if an error occurred.

## Discussion

Don’t call this method directly. Call [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/IODataQueueDispatchSource/Create] when you want to create a new data-queue dispatch source.

## Configuring the Dispatch Source

- **Create**: Creates a dispatch source that you use as a shared-memory data queue.
- **free**: Performs any final cleanup for the data-queue dispatch source.
